statements: DELETE FROM carbon_emissions_data WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND emission_year = 2019;
DELETE FROM carbon_emissions_data WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' AND emission_value > 1000;
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND emissions_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND emissions_amount > 100;
DELETE FROM emissions WHERE emission_id = 10 AND emission_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA' AND emission_rate > 0.5;
DELETE FROM SupplierCategories WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND category_id = 2;

DELETE FROM SupplierAddresses WHERE supplier_id = 1;
DELETE FROM EmissionsData WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND emission_value > 1000;
